radiographic_examinations.findings: Characteristics of HPP in adults, including metatarsal stress fractures and a nonhealing subtrochanteric femoral pseudofracture.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval development of severe diffuse osteopenia admixed with mottled sclerosis resembling renal osteodystrophy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive calcification of the cerebral tentorium.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Somewhat increased calcification for age despite inhibition of skeletal mineralization from HPP.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe osteomalacia with increased osteoid accumulation and low cellular activity.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased osteoid compared to a previous biopsy showing no hyperparathyroidism despite radiographic changes consistent with renal osteodystrophy.
